author: Howkins, Thomas.
notes: Copy catalogued imperfect; title and imprint from Wing.
All after first page lacking in copy catalogued; consists of one unsigned leaf (which includes dedication and is signed by the author), and one ms. leaf.
At top of page: Loving friends, Having taken the shop that was Benjamin Clark's and bought of his stock, ..
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
